input.sentences: friday was open mic night at the local cafe .
someone spun some tunes while we danced .
then the main attraction | a local ska artist sang .
he was a huge hit | and we told him so after the show .
output.sentences: Friday is open mic night at our local coffee shop.
My friends spun each other and danced while a trumpeter played a tune.
The main event was a visiting ska singer.
I told the manager that the event was a huge hit.
